question: Well I was induced at 37 weeks and 4 days becuse I had preeclampsia that was getting worse before I was induced I had been in the hospital for 10 days on bed rest so they induced me at 4am Sunday morning and I had a very very hard labor my blood pressure was getting so high there was points where the RNs and my mom and fiancé thought they were losing me my eyes would roll back in my head I would start shaking and I could talk and I would come back to not knowing what was going on but I had it throw and had my little gilt at 11:13pm she was born 6.8 and 19inch long everything I have gone throgh the pest 13 days now has been all worth it the min I had her and they put her on me and now 3 days later she is doing great and I'm starting to get better maybe going home today!
title: Labor!
